title: Best of The Program | Guests: Jason Whitlock & Amy Peikoff | 1/11/21
description:
The world we live in now isn’t the same as it was before the Capitol riots: There are two Americas now. The riots did nothing but strengthen Big Tech. Columnist Jason Whitlock breaks down his new BlazeTV op-ed, “Ignoring the Concerns of Trump Supporters Will Destroy America." Google, Apple, and Amazon took social media site Parler off the internet. Parler chief policy officer Amy Peikoff joins with the latest on Big Tech’s attack and Parler’s efforts to rebuild and move forward.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
